events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I would like to request a refund as it does not fit me properly and I no longer want to keep it.
System has detected the issue relates to a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning refund and return.
Support case assigned to agent Rachel M. for processing the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent purchase. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and let us know if the jacket has been returned or if you need instructions on how to return it?
The order number is 4893274. I have not returned the jacket yet and would appreciate instructions on how to proceed with the return.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket using our prepaid return label which I will email to you shortly. Once we receive the item, we will process your refund promptly.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the jacket back today using the label once received.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund for the returned jacket and to see if you need any further assistance.
As the refund has been successfully processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
